
            <h1 class="postTitle">
                <a id="cb_post_title_url" class="postTitle2 vertical-middle" href="https://www.cnblogs.com/Can-daydayup/p/18710557" title="发布于 2025-02-11 21:57">
    <span role="heading" aria-level="2">告别 DeepSeek 系统繁忙，七个 DeepSeek 曲线救国平替入口，官网崩溃也能用！</span>
    

</a>

            </h1>
            <div class="clear"></div>
            <div class="postBody">
                <div id="cnblogs_post_body" class="blogpost-body blogpost-body-html">
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器">前言</h2>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>DeepSeek作为一款备受瞩目的国产大模型，以其强大的功能和卓越的性能赢得了众多用户的青睐。然而，随着用户量的激增，DeepSeek官网近期频繁遭遇服务器繁忙甚至崩溃的问题，给广大用户带来了不小的困扰。面对这一现状，许多用户急于寻找能够替代或绕过官网限制的方法，以继续享受DeepSeek带来的便捷与高效。</span></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202502/1336199-20250211215149452-1280161599.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<blockquote>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><strong>本文大姚给大家分享七个 DeepSeek <span>曲线救国平替入口，助你畅通无阻探索AI新世界！</span></strong></p>
</blockquote>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器">DeepSeek官网</h2>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">
<li><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://chat.deepseek.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://chat.deepseek.com</span></a></span></li>
</ul>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202502/1336199-20250211215213565-1504189598.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器">DeepSeek从入门到精通免费教程</h2>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器">清华大学推出的 DeepSeek 从入门到精通（104页）免费教程！</p>
<blockquote data-tool="mdnice编辑器">
<p>公众号「<span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)"><strong>追逐时光者</strong></span>」回复关键字领取下载链接：<span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)"><strong>DeepSeek</strong></span></p>
</blockquote>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202502/1336199-20250211215327605-1808661909.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>

<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器">超算互联网</h2>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">
<li>访问地址：<span style="color: rgba(51, 102, 255, 1)"><a href="https://chat.scnet.cn/#/home" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow"><span class="wx_text_underline" style="color: rgba(51, 102, 255, 1)">https://chat.scnet.cn/#/home</span></a></span></li>
</ul>
